title: Grip Vol. 1
description: There is a kind of control - of the hands - a type of touch - that is skillful and sure, a graceful and practiced ability, to manipulate... anything...GRIP; After a strange incident a young women's hands are never still. A hand-heavy homage to women in the trades and people using their hands, Grip is an odyssey transmitted in twisting sign language.
author: Lale Westvind
